name: Greedy Worm-Pass Levels
description:
Greedy Worm is a logical puzzle game. You take control of a worm hungry for apples, every time you eat one apple you get larger(based on a snake-like mechanic), after eating all apples in a level you need to escape through the black hole. As you get more and more into the game levels get more complex, they get new obstacles and require weirder movement patterns to get the apple and reach the black hole. Bend your worm back and forth, up and down to eat all the apples you can and transform yourself into a fly and be free.
Help the lazy fat snake to eat all those juicy apples in this fun-addicting puzzle game, Greedy Worm. In each level, you have to find a way of reaching the exit portal without falling down. You may have to take a little bite to grow some centimeters or move blocks around in order to reach the gate. This game challenges you to slink into the portal. You can eat apples in each level to grow. Sometimes, there is only one way to win. Choose your slithering path wisely!
Control a tiny worm and get ready to cross the game screen. Enjoy this puzzle game based on classic ‘Snake’ — cross the apple and stay safe!
Are you smart enough to clear all 122 stages?
